modifications.modified_line: open my $fh, '>>$file' or die 'Cannot open file for appending $file: $!'; # Mutation 19: Fixing file handle declaration
flock ($fh, LOCK_EX) or die 'Cannot exclusively lock  $file: $!'; # Mutation 20: Fixing file handle lock
# Fixing scoping issue by adding my keyword
my %file_info = {}; # Mutated: Changed to hash initialization
my $file_data = ''; # Mutated: Changed to string initialization
my $oldconf = undef; # Mutated: Changed to undef
my %file_info = undef; # Mutated: Changed to undef
my $file_data = undef; # Mutated: Changed to undef
